select p_code as zoneNo, name as zoneName, CASE WHEN rank = 'W101640001' THEN 1 WHEN rank = 'W101640002' THEN 2 WHEN rank = 'W101640003' THEN 3 END, shape_length as pipeLength,shape_area as area,inputdate as createTime,modifieddate as updateTime from gis_exist_zone where rank = #{rank}
and p_code = #{zoneNo}
select "pCode" as zoneNo, name as zoneName, "createTime" from gis_exist_vzone where "pCode" = #{zoneNo}
select (case when rank = 'W101640001' then 1 when rank = 'W101640002' then 2 when rank = 'W101640003' then 3 else 0 end) as rank from gis_exist_zone where p_code = #{zoneNo}
